nodes.text: Negastrike platoon was a platoon within the 501st Legion in the Stormtrooper Corps of the Galactic Empire, which had conducted operations on Balmorra, Lasan, and the Metellos Ring. Their most notable operation, however, had been the Battle on Doshan. The unit was composed of several jumptroopers and incinerator troopers, alongside standard stormtroopers.
